description: False Kiva is a secret unofficial trail not promoted by the park leading to a spectacular view on Canyonlands, often photographed by professionals and others.
directions: Drive in Canyonlands south, take Upheaval Dome Rd, park on the ride side of road at 38.4232, 109.908, walk back a ~200 yards and follow your GPS track in south-west direction.
title: False Kiva
